data.name: ViewItemPageTitle
data.comment: Page title for viewing an item

data.name: ViewItemTitle
data.comment: Page header title for viewing an item

data.name: EditButtonMobile
data.comment: Text for edit button on mobile

data.name: EditButtonDesktop
data.comment: Text for edit button on desktop

data.name: DeleteButtonMobile
data.comment: Text for delete button on mobile

data.name: DeleteButtonDesktop
data.comment: Text for delete button on desktop

data.name: GeneratedItemDescription
data.value: Below you can view and copy the generated details for this item. Any emails sent to the shown address will automatically appear on this page.
data.comment: Description for generated item with email support

data.name: StoredItemDescription
data.value: Below you can view and copy the stored login details for this item.
data.comment: Description for stored item without email support

data.name: ViewItemBreadcrumb
data.comment: Breadcrumb text for view item page

data.name: ItemNotFoundError
data.value: This item does not exist (anymore). Please try again.
data.comment: Error message when item is not found

data.name: PasskeySiteLabel
data.comment: Label for passkey site/relying party ID

data.name: PasskeyHelpText
data.value: Passkeys are created through the browser extension or mobile apps when prompted by a website. They cannot be manually edited or created through the web app. To remove this passkey, edit this item and delete the passkey. To replace or create a new passkey, visit the website and follow its prompts.
data.comment: Help text explaining how passkeys work

data.name: Untitled
data.comment: Placeholder for items without a name

data.name: CardSection
data.comment: Section header for credit card details
